headline: Is Visa Inc. (V) The Best Stock to Buy and Hold For 10 Years?

headline: 3 Dividend Stocks You Can Be Comfortable Buying and Holding, Even in a Recession
summary: Visa delivers moderate growth that supports a massive capital return program.  Kenvue presents a classic value situation in a company with many well-known brands.  Essential Utilities is a leading water utility stock with a multidecade history of hiking its dividend.

headline: ClearBridge Appreciation ESG Portfolios Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Despite a fast start to the year, a broad-based rally propelled the S&P 500 Index +2.8% in January, the market struggled for traction in the first quarter of 2025.
